componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: You and your students can access our Writing Guide with Handbook textbook and resources on day one of your class for free. Our textbooks come with a suite of instructor resources to support your teaching, a wide selection of educational technology options, and so much more. If you're interested in other subjects, you can also browse our library of over 45 online textbooks that are all free for you and your students.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: We know it can be overwhelming to navigate so we've put together a list of our top six must-knows about OpenStax. Learn about resources, how OpenStax can support your classroom, and much more in our blog post below!

componentInstanceProperties.name: buttonText
componentInstanceProperties.value: Six things to know about OpenStax

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: "I learn more with [OpenStax textbooks] compared to traditional textbooks. Textbooks are also often outdated or lack information that can be instantly updated with open educational resources like the ones OpenStax provides. These resources have become a monumental step ladder in classrooms and for independent learning." -Arie'una, student at Lake Oconee Academy
